service_name: Unified Communications (UCaaS) Hosted Skype for Business (formerly Lync)
page_content:
EASYNET ENTERPRISE SERVICES LIMITED

Unified Communications (UCaaS) Hosted Skype for Business (formerly Lync)

A private cloud hosted or O365 hybrid Unified Communications solution. Built on Microsoft Skype for Business 2015 with IM, presence, audio, video and web conferencing and full enterprise telephony with PSTN connectivity and PBX features. Can integrate with a suite of complementary Easynet applications to deliver a full UC experience.

Features

  • Enriched ability to find and communicate between employees with presence
  • Full PBX feature-set provides complete replacement for legacy telephony
  • Consistent per user per month pricing model
  • Full UC experience across all devices regardless of location
  • Full PSTN/PBX replacement options with transition/migration services included
  • Federation extends communications securely to citizens, online partnerships and suppliers
  • Built on familiar technology. Uniform look-and-feel across devices
  • A secure hosted solution with encryption and recording as standard
  • Private cloud integrated or hybrid design with Office 365
  • Direct Express Route access into Office 365 for hybrid designs

Benefits

  • Can contribute as part of a major transformational IT project
  • Enables mobile, flexible, and transformed working across your organisation
  • Provides your motivated workforce tools to collaborate and work smarter
  • Can utilise your existing licences via your Enterprise Agreement
  • Rapid deployment with a flexible architecture for disaster recovery
  • Enrich communication with video and content for all meetings
  • Engage outside the organisation with live Skype Broadcasts
  • Avoid cost and difficulty of managing/integrating own UC solution
  • Keep a digital record of conversations, meetings and events

Pricing

£9.15 to £12.50 per user per month

  • Excluding VAT
  • Minimum contract period: Month
  • Trial and free options available
